org.apache.http.io
接口 SessionOutputBuffer

所有已知实现类：
AbstractSessionOutputBuffer, LoggingSessionOutputBuffer, SocketOutputBuffer
public interface SessionOutputBuffer

Session output buffer for blocking connections.

4.0
